note: Complete mount database for FFXIV. IDs are sequential placeholders - use mount NAME for matching with in-game data.

1.name: Adamantoise
1.acquired_by: Purchased from the Gold Saucer Attendant for 200,000 MGP.

2.name: Aerodynamics System
2.acquired_by: Awarded from the Achievement In a Blaze of Glory V by winning 100 Frontline PvP matches on Fields of Glory with any of the Grand Companies.

3.name: Aeturna
3.acquired_by: Awarded from the Achievement Vintage Vogue by speaking with Koh Rabntah while in possession of all four of the enaretos accessories.

4.name: Ahriman
4.acquired_by: Purchased from Jonathas in Old Gridania for 6 Achievement Certificates.

5.name: Air Force
5.acquired_by: Guaranteed drop upon completion of Sigmascape V4.0 (Savage).

6.name: Air-wheeler A9
6.acquired_by: Purchased from Neon in Solution Nine for 7,500,000 gil.

7.name: Air-wheeler C9
7.acquired_by: Guaranteed drop upon completion of AAC Cruiserweight M4 (Savage).

8.name: Aithon
8.acquired_by: Random drop upon completion of The Bowl of Embers (Extreme).

9.name: Al-iklil
9.acquired_by: Attain the Achievement A Complete History by collecting all 50 Field Record entries.

10.name: Albino Karakul
10.acquired_by: Purchased from Enie in The Firmament for 8,400 Skybuilders' Scrips.

11.name: Alkonost
11.acquired_by: Purchased from Nesvaaz in Radz-at-Han (10.6, 10) for 3 Resplendent Feathers from Endwalker treasure maps.

12.name: Alpaca
12.acquired_by: Reward for completing the Main Scenario Quest Dawntrail.

13.name: Alte Roite
13.acquired_by: Guaranteed drop upon completion of Deltascape V4.0 (Savage)

14.name: Amaro
14.acquired_by: Awarded from the Achievement A Life of Adventure IV by getting every Disciple of War and Disciple of Magic that starts below level 80 (excluding Reaper, Sage, and Blue Mage) to level 80.

15.name: Amber Draught Chocobo
15.acquired_by: Purchased from any Calamity Salvager for 8 Gold Chocobo Feathers. Gold Chocobo Feathers can be obtained through the Recruit a Friend campaign, or through World Population Balancing Incentives.

16.name: Ambulario
16.acquired_by: Reward for completing the Seasonal Event Quest Dressed to Impresario during All Saints' Wake (2025).

17.name: Ancient Airship
17.acquired_by: Purchase from the Expedition Antiquarian in South Horn for 5,000 Enlightenment Silver Pieces.

18.name: Anden III
18.acquired_by: Complete the quest A Labor of Leaf which requires Custom Delivery level 5 with Anden.

19.name: Antelope Doe
19.acquired_by: Purchased from Enie in The Firmament for 8,400 Skybuilders' Scrips.

20.name: Antelope Stag
20.acquired_by: Purchased from Enie in The Firmament for 30 Fête Tokens. Randomly drops from Fête Present.

21.name: Apocryphal Bahamut
21.acquired_by: Reward for completing the Sidequest " Wings of Hope" after acquiring the 7 Lynx mounts from Endwalker extreme trials.

23.name: Archon Throne
23.acquired_by: Purchased from the Gold Saucer Attendant for 750,000 MGP.

24.name: Argos
24.acquired_by: Reward for completing the Main Scenario Quest Endwalker.

25.name: Arion
25.acquired_by: Purchase the Collector's Edition or Digital Collector's Edition of Endwalker. (account-wide)

26.name: Ark
26.acquired_by: Purchase the Collector's Edition or Digital Collector's Edition of Dawntrail. (account-wide)

27.name: Arrhidaeus
27.acquired_by: Guaranteed drop upon completion of Alexander - The Soul of the Creator (Savage).

28.name: Astrope
28.acquired_by: Awarded from the Achievement I Hope Mentor Will Notice Me VI by completing 2,000 duties via the Duty Roulette: Mentor.

29.name: Auspicious Kamuy
29.acquired_by: Random drop upon completion of The Jade Stoa (Extreme). Purchased from Eschina for 99 Byakko Totems.

30.name: Automatoise
30.acquired_by: Purchased from Ryubool Ja at Tuliyollal (X:13.9 Y:13.5) for 3,200 Sack of Nuts.

31.name: Barreltender
31.acquired_by: Purchased from Splendors Vendor in Solution Nine (X:9.1, Y:13.2) for 100 Mount Tokens (effectively 100,000 Orange Gatherers' Scrips).

32.name: Battle Bear
32.acquired_by: Awarded from the Achievement Tank You, Warrior III by completing 300 dungeons (lv. 61 and above), extreme trials (lv. 61 and above), high-level duty roulette dungeons, or duty roulette leveling duties as a Warrior.

33.name: Battle Lion
33.acquired_by: Awarded from the Achievement Tank You, Paladin III by completing 300 dungeons (lv. 61 and above), extreme trials (lv. 61 and above), high-level duty roulette dungeons, or duty roulette leveling duties as a Paladin.

34.name: Battle Panther
34.acquired_by: Awarded from the Achievement Tank You, Dark Knight III by completing 300 dungeons (lv. 61 and above), extreme trials (lv. 61 and above), high-level duty roulette dungeons, or duty roulette leveling duties as a Dark Knight.

35.name: Battle Tiger
35.acquired_by: Awarded from the Achievement Tank You, Gunbreaker III by completing 300 dungeons (lv. 61 and above), extreme trials (lv. 61 and above), high-level duty roulette dungeons, or duty roulette leveling duties as a Gunbreaker.

36.name: Behemoth
36.acquired_by: Purchased from Jonathas in Old Gridania for 6 Achievement Certificates.

38.name: Big Shell

39.name: Black Chocobo

48.name: Broken Heart (left)

49.name: Broken Heart (right)
49.acquired_by: Reward for completing the Seasonal Event Quest Lessons in Love during Valentione's Day (2018). Purchased from the House Valentione Maid for 6 Valentione's Day Chocolates during Valentione's Day (2018). Final Fantasy XIV Online Store - ($12 / £7.44 / €9 / ¥1320)

51.name: Calydontis

55.name: Cerberus

56.name: Ceremony Chocobo

57.name: Chandelier of First Light
